thread.section_title: The Gallivant Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect
thread.title_full: Perfect - Review of The Gallivant Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 413eddie
title: Perfect
text: You can't go wrong at this hotel. We were one block from Times Square for less than $125 a night are you kidding me! Hotel was clean, front staff were great, room was big enough for a full size bed, desk and two end tables and no view. Did I mention the price, this is the best hotel for your money in Times Square. There is a great Italian cafe across the street with awesome coffee and pastries. Less than a block away is Times Square diner which has an amazing affordable breakfast.
